column5: Hey all,  Please sign the Petition....  http://firerichardpeddie.ca/
LOL.... or bring back Fletcher....<---geez what is MLSE DOING!!!!!  G
Hey Gerritt,  Actually, reports are saying that they asked him to be the interm GM... Bob M reported last night...   FINGERs ARE CROSSED!

Yeah! they were talking about him coming back as interm GM as Ferguson is gonna get the boot!... but why bring back a relic from the past that could not give the a cup... sure they made the playoffs but no cup...  Only one thing to bring him back for...  To dismantle the team.  think Wendel, Fuhr, Sundin  they called him trader Cliff LOL!  about time too imho.   I say let the leafs finish dead last this year and pick up a first round pick  but even the leafs could screw that up! LOL G
lol, the petition seems to be down for a bit, overlaod of traffic? or peddie using his magical powers?
